column1: Perbaungan is a town and a district in Serdang Bedagai Regency
Perbaungan is the gateway city when entering Serdang Bedagai Regency from the direction of Medan. It has an area of 111.62 km2
column3: 296 in 2015. Perbaungan was the capital of the Sultanate of Serdang in the past where the center of government of the Sultanate
